entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Assiniboia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 a.m. CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 early this morning. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight then changing to snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023
